member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: This is a class, which adds extension methods to the String Class

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into MD5 Hash.
member.returns: Computes and returns an MD5 Hash from the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts truelike strings, e.g "true", "OK", etc. to boolean.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalizes the first letter of the input string.
member.returns: Returns a string with capitalized first letter.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a substring from a string, contained between two substrings in this string.
member.param: Start index in the original string
member.returns: Returns the substring from the original string, between the startString and endString parameters

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts Cyrillic letters to their Latin equivalents

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts Latin letters to their Cyrillic equivalents

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Convert invalid username (written in Cyrillic letters) to a valid one
member.returns: Valid username containing Latin letters and numbers

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Convert file name in cyrillic to a valid file name with Latin letters.
member.returns: Valid file name, written in Latin letters

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first N characters from the beginning of a string.
member.returns: Returns a substring from the beginning of the input string with length N

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file extension from a valid file name
member.returns: Returns the file extension as string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Checks the file extension and returns the associated content type
member.returns: Returns the content type of the input file extension

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a byte array.
